title: The best Christmas presents for everyone on your list
text:
The cosy ones

  1. Cotton and linen napkins (set of four), £100, Hay by Laila Gohar at selfridges.com

  2. Ceramic trinket tray, £49, Alex Eagle at alexeagle.com

  3. Steel and aluminium ‘bolt' floor light, £470, Antone de Groof Tonone at scp.co.uk

  4. Hand-thrown porcelain ‘Tidal mug', £42, at artemisdeco.com or glassette.com

  5. Handmade clay ‘genie in a bottle' check vase, £80, Vaisselle at libertylondon.com

  6. Wool gingham blanket, £250, Johnstons of Elgin x Ben Pentreath at brownsfashion.com

  7. Linen embroidered placemat, set of two, £74, HMA decor for the Hambledon at thehambledon.com

  8. Handmade Murano glass ‘Cosimo' coupe glasses (set of two), £210, Campbell-Rey x Laguna B at matchesfashion.com

  9. Wire mesh ‘Marais' basket, £40, Fest Amsterdam at conranshop.co.uk

  10. Abstract patchwork cotton quilt, £315, Toast at toa.st

  11. Limited edition pre-mixed ‘Cuban toddy' cocktail, 500ml, £25, lockdown-liquor.com

  12. Floral print ‘Amaya Nea' organic cotton and silk robe, £350, Olivia Von Halle at netaporter.com

  13. Signed copy of ‘Every Room Should Sing' by Beata Heuman, published by Rizzoli International, £45, shoppa.beataheuman.com

  14. Earthenware-glazed ‘cheeky' pot, £108, Ana O at crouchers.com

The useful ones

  1. Apple Watch Ultra, titanium case with orange alpine loop, from £849, apple.com/uk

  2. iPhone 14 pro, from £1,099, apple.com/uk

  3. Nikon Z FC mirrorless digital camera, from £809, nikon.co.uk

  4. ‘Toolbox' storage caddy in tangerine, £29, Vitra by Arik Levy 2010 at vitra.com

  5. Enamel bread bin, £95, at labourandwait.co.uk

  6. ‘The Duel' luxury supersized matches, £36, at archivistgallery.com

  7. Sonos ‘Roam' portable speaker in wave blue, £179, sonos.com

  8. Steel watering can, £30, at labourandwait.co.uk

  9. Fireplace shovel and brush, £170, Eldvarm at amara.com.

  10. Aluminium carry-on wheeled case, £545, awaytravel.com

  11. Link leather-trimmed nylon-twill backpack by Master-Piece, £165 at mrporter.com

The playful ones

  1. ‘First Go' balance bike, £127, Banwood at kidly.co.uk

  2. Virtual-reality headset, £399, Meta Quest 2 at johnlewis.com

  3. Miffy night light, £125.95, Mr Maria at themodernnursery.com

  4. Canvas checkerboard tote with inside pocket, £35, BB+DD at bbdd-thestore.co.uk

  5. Glass brush pot, £40, Bridie Hall at pentreath-hall.com

  6. The No2 hair brush, £120, La Bonne Brosse at harrods.com

  7. Wool-and-cotton-blend panda rug, £106, Liewood at scandiborn.co.uk

  8. Recycled polyester colour-block backpack, £67, Bobo Choses at smallable.com

  9. Beechwood Balance and Play Wobbel Board, £135, kidly.co.uk

  10. Striped Panda Faux-Fur Puffer Jacket, £130, minirodini.com

  11. Water-resistant faux fur ‘Arctic Cub' trapper hat, from £30, littlehotdogwatson.com

  12. Magnetic ‘My First Safari Animals' toy set, £19.99, Smartmax at smarttoysandgames.co.uk

Source: Kelly Moseley 2022 'The best Christmas presents for everyone on your list' FT.com 19 November. Used under licence from the Financial Times. © The Financial Times Limited 2022. All Rights Reserved.
